required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Estimation of Off-Label Use of XGEVA® (Denosumab) Using Population-Based Databases in Denmark
clinical_study.official_title: Estimation of Off-Label Use of XGEVA® (Denosumab) Using Population-Based Databases in Denmark

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to evaluate off-label XGEVA use in Denmark using data linked from registries and other sources in Northern Jutland Region of Denmark. This will allow for accurate assessment of prescriptions and diagnoses, especially those related to cancer patients during the first year post the initial market availability of XGEVA.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective

primary_outcome.measure: on or off label individual prescription type
primary_outcome.description: Yes/no regarding whether an individual prescription was on (or off) label

primary_outcome.measure: on or off label patient treatment
primary_outcome.description: Yes/no regarding whether the patient was treated on (or off) label

secondary_outcome.description: XGEVA prescription for each type of off-label use

secondary_outcome.measure: off-label use stratified by administering department
secondary_outcome.description: Prescriptions that are for off-label use stratified by department that administers treatment

intervention.intervention_name: Database assesssment of off-label XGEVA use
intervention.description: No intervention is planned during this study as it involves analyses of patient electronic records from Northern Jutland Region of Denmark

study_pop.textblock: The study population will include 108-200 patients who receive a prescription in secondary care of XGEVA during the first year after the initial market availability. These patients will be identified from the Danish National Registry of Patients in the Northern Jutland Region of Denmark.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The study will include patients with a prescription for XGEVA® given in secondary care with a maximum of 200 XGEVA users, in the Northern Jutland Region of Denmark during the first 1-year post XGEVA market availability, defined as 12 months after RADS opinion on 24th January 2013.
Exclusion Criteria:
- n/a
